title: Zebrainy: learning games for kids and toddlers 2-7
description:
An educational app for kids ages 2-7 featuring games, stories, and cartoons. Learn your ABC’s, letters, numbers, sizes, colors, and shapes! Learn to read by syllables and count! Develop emotional intelligence, logic, and reasoning. Doesn't that sound great?

Have you ever thought about early education for your kids? At which age is it right to start learning the alphabet? Zebrainy is an educational game where you can find all sorts of learning games for kids, no matter how old they are.

Zebrainy will help you to develop kids’ memory, reading skills, matching abilities, concentration, and creativity. It is not a simple ABC game for toddlers; you will find 1st-grade math material, shapes and colors vocabulary, drawing and coloring tasks, “English A-Z”, where each letter has a short cartoon with new words every time.

Our team consists of professional teachers, scientific consultants, composers, and very talented artists. All these people go the extra mile when it comes to quality.

Get your toddler ready for school! With ABC games, it will be much easier for your child to learn the alphabet and start reading than in tedious preschool lessons! The colors used in the app develop their imagination, perception, and attention. It's a fun learning game for boys and girls both! If your child is 5-6-7 years old, already knows numbers and letters, pre-school and kindergarten are over, don't worry! The app can still come in handy!  Math and reading are essential not only in the 1st grade, and it is highly recommended to revise the information with a child from time to time. 

What the difference between Zebrainy and other educational games for kids?
- It helps your baby to fall in love with drawing, reading
- In just 2 month toddlers will know shapes and colors
- It takes just nine months for your kid to complete the full course preparation for school (you can start in kindergarten or even earlier)
- It is easier to communicate with a kid after using the app
- Multiple coloring tasks will improve your toddler’s imagination
- The app doesn’t separate games for boys and girls 

The main advantages of Zebrainy: 
- It takes into account your child's abilities, gender, age and flexibility of mind
- Kids get awards and a collection of artifacts 
- At the end of the day, kids can watch educational cartoons 
- In the menu, parents can check the achievements of their children

The list of skills except for preschool learning:
- The ability to set and achieve goals
- Navigating in a strange environment,
- Making decisions quickly
- Communicating with others and making connections
- Analyzing different information, and coming to the right conclusions 
- It is an educational challenge, so your kid will never get bored

Which features differ Zebrainy from the others?
- Artificial intelligence creates a unique program for kids and toddlers due to their activity and age
- Alphabet learning (composing each letter with round elements help develop fine motor skills and visual memory)
- Cartoons and interactive educational processes make it more than simply an ABC game for kids. It answers different needs in every stage of growth.

Since this is a toddler learning game, it can be used if your baby is 1, 2, or 3 years old,  and it is also a great educational app for preschoolers 4-6 years old, and even 7-year-old first graders! It is a scientific fact that kids perceive everything from birth. So all the commands in the game eventually will form a base for further successful education. We guarantee that your baby will be learning safely and at the correct level.
 
You can send any questions or suggestions to support@zebrainy.com
 
Privacy and Access Policy:
http://zebrainy.com/privacy-policy/
http://zebrainy.com/terms-of-service/

If your child is 5-6-7 years old, already knows numbers and letters, pre-school and kindergarten are over, don't worry! The app can still come in handy! Math and reading are essential not only in the 1st grade, and it is highly recommended to revise the information with a child from time to time.

What the difference between Zebrainy and other educational games for kids?
- It helps your baby to fall in love with drawing, reading
- In just 2 month toddlers will know shapes and colors
- It takes just nine months for your kid to complete the full course preparation for school (you can start in kindergarten or even earlier)
- It is easier to communicate with a kid after using the app
- Multiple coloring tasks will improve your toddler’s imagination
- The app doesn’t separate games for boys and girls

The main advantages of Zebrainy:
- It takes into account your child's abilities, gender, age and flexibility of mind
- Kids get awards and a collection of artifacts
- At the end of the day, kids can watch educational cartoons
- In the menu, parents can check the achievements of their children

The list of skills except for preschool learning:
- The ability to set and achieve goals
- Navigating in a strange environment,
- Making decisions quickly
- Communicating with others and making connections
- Analyzing different information, and coming to the right conclusions
- It is an educational challenge, so your kid will never get bored

Which features differ Zebrainy from the others?
- Artificial intelligence creates a unique program for kids and toddlers due to their activity and age
- Alphabet learning (composing each letter with round elements help develop fine motor skills and visual memory)
- Cartoons and interactive educational processes make it more than simply an ABC game for kids. It answers different needs in every stage of growth.

Since this is a toddler learning game, it can be used if your baby is 1, 2, or 3 years old, and it is also a great educational app for preschoolers 4-6 years old, and even 7-year-old first graders! It is a scientific fact that kids perceive everything from birth. So all the commands in the game eventually will form a base for further successful education. We guarantee that your baby will be learning safely and at the correct level.

You can send any questions or suggestions to support@zebrainy.com

Download Funimate Video editor & music video maker now, and see the results by yourself.

You don’t have to be an expert, Funimate instantly transforms an everyday moment into creative and cool videos. With its patent-pending technology, you can create awesome musical videos with unique real-time effects.

Easily share your fan edit videos, musical videos, lip-sync videos, slow motion videos on Tiktok, Musically, Instagram, Youtube, Facebook and amaze your friends!

comments: Honestly no idea why- but ive been experiencing so many problems with recent updates. Ive been working on this edit and all the transitions are extremely buggy- they won't even transition smoothly, it just cuts off. At first i didn't mind it because it wasn't too noticeable. But now its every single transition that won't come out smooth. Literally trying to do anything on this app either crashes the whole app or just messes up transitions.

It had been working fine just the videos came out laggy all the time. Today i had spent an hour working on a video and the app just closed, everytime i went back in it would ask if i would like to continue editing and i clicked resume but then it would just close again. After a few times didnt even give the option to resume anymore and now i basically lost an hour of my life because of bugs.

So I loved this app and I still do but there is one problem. I had this app signed into my old phone so when I got my new phone I tried so many times to log in but it keeps saying "Account already registered" So I have to be as a guest but I really wanna go on funimate as my account. Please help me log back into funimate.

Honestly, super good! It's given me quite inspiration to do more things! The effects, filters are nice, and so is just everything in all. The reason I gave a star off, though, is because of the "Locked" items that can only be given through following FM on different platforms, but all in all a good software!

My experience was just horrible I had to buy pro to get my edit which I spent hours on. If it would only come to that why wouldn't yall mention that in the beginning? I never got my edit and it took a lot of time to make. I'm upset. I'm never using this app again nor am I recommending it to anyone. Thank you have a good day. I hope this problem can be fixed.

title: Brainy Mouse
description:
Brainy Mouse is a game developed to enhance the quality of life in children living with Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD): it facilitates them to learn and recognize words, syllables and letters while also being able to enjoy the process. The game assists in the improvement of communication, supporting its development in children with ASD while helping them become more socially interactive.

Every child has the right to indenpendece through reading and writing.Brainy Mouse is a solution that helps children with disabilities,incluing autism, improve their literacy. The story of the mouse takes place in a restaurant.
The mouse..... the words are formed by seeking the clues ( syllables),paying attention to the colours,associated with sounds and graphic.
While playing, the child is learning how to form the words by combining the syllables in the correct order at the same time avoiding the chef.


Brainy Mouse é uma solução que ajuda a alfabetizar a criança autista e oferece bem estar e felicidade ao usuário. A história do mouse acontece em um restaurante. A criança precisa pegar a comida para fazer uma receita. Ela forma as palavras que buscam as dicas (sílabas), prestando atenção às cores, associadas a sons e gráficos.
Enquanto brinca, a criança está aprendendo, uma vez que precisa formar as palavras e as sílabas ao tentar escapar dos cozinheiros.
A atmosfera do jogo acontece nas cozinhas, representando a culinária mundial.
O objetivo principal do jogo é completar as receitas dos pratos de menu de cada cozinha.
Você precisa coletar as sílabas e formar as palavras de cada ingrediente sem ser escolhido pelo chef.
No final de cada fase, você ganha de uma a três estrelas, de acordo com o desempenho do jogador.
Proporcional ao número de estrelas, você obtém o ponto de corte, o cheesecake do jogo. Quanto mais ágil, rápido e inteligente você for, melhor será seu desempenho, mais cheesecoin poderá conquistá-lo e trocá-lo por vários acessórios e ações para escapar dos chefs de nossa loja.
Acesse nosso canal no  youtube e confira vários vídeos:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCO8xvT1QBwaUJXA9C08ivtQ?view_as=subscriber

IMPORTANTE: Versão mínima necessária para utilização adequada do aplicativo (6.0)

title: ASD Activities
description: If you want to understand autism, you must first understand your child. Children on this spectrum are capable of excellence. If their needs are met properly, they are likely to be fully recovered. Parents face many problems when raising a child with special needs. For parents who are having trouble doing so, we intend to help them by combining all the information available to us and posting a variety of activities, therapies , articles, news and fact checks daily this app.

title: Photo Lab: Picture Editor & Halloween Face Filters
description:
Photo Lab boasts one of the vastest collections of stylish and funny photo effects: more than 900 effects to date! Fantastic face photo montages, photo frames, animated effects, and photo filters are here for you to enjoy. 

Make your image look creative in seconds without using a professional editor and set it as a contact icon, a wallpaper, send a signed virtual postcard to a friend or share it to any social network.

App’s foremost features include:

☆ Neural Art Styles:
a new smart (and quick) way to turn any photo into an artwork - choose from over 50 pre-set styles.

☆ Photo frames:
choose one of our beautiful frames if you need a final touch to your favorite picture.

☆ Realistic photo effects:
place your image in an unlikely setting. Airbrush it on an exclusive car or leave it as a sand imprint on the beach. You are welcome to get a new wonderful experience!

☆ Face photo montages:
swap face easily and turn yourself or your friend into pirate, an astronaut or a horrible monster. The most complicated montages are handled automatically by a face detection algorithm to create the most unusual selfies.

☆ Photo filters:
you don't need a pro photo editor to add some style to your images with various photo filters such as Black&White, Neon Glow, Oil Painting and many others.

☆ Photo collages:
create a wonderful picture of you and your friend floating together in a sentimental or futuristic setting.

The simple and intuitive app interface helps you quickly learn how to use the picture editor. Almost a dozen of new photo frames and effects is added with each update. We maintain a fruitful dialogue with our users. If you didn't find a particular photo effect in the library, contact the team and you might see it in the next update.

Photo Lab will change your life forever!*

* Photo Lab may or may not change your life but you're totally going to love it!


Please note that Photo Lab is an Internet-based application. It helps us keep your devices' memory free from tons of resources required to create high-quality artworks of your photos.

🎉ps: Photo Lab app is officially announced one of the best apps of 2017 by Google, Russia🎉
descriptionHTML:
Photo Lab boasts one of the vastest collections of stylish and funny photo effects: more than 900 effects to date! Fantastic face photo montages, photo frames, animated effects, and photo filters are here for you to enjoy.

Make your image look creative in seconds without using a professional editor and set it as a contact icon, a wallpaper, send a signed virtual postcard to a friend or share it to any social network.

App’s foremost features include:

☆ Neural Art Styles:
a new smart (and quick) way to turn any photo into an artwork - choose from over 50 pre-set styles.

☆ Photo frames:
choose one of our beautiful frames if you need a final touch to your favorite picture.

☆ Realistic photo effects:
place your image in an unlikely setting. Airbrush it on an exclusive car or leave it as a sand imprint on the beach. You are welcome to get a new wonderful experience!

☆ Face photo montages:
swap face easily and turn yourself or your friend into pirate, an astronaut or a horrible monster. The most complicated montages are handled automatically by a face detection algorithm to create the most unusual selfies.

☆ Photo filters:
you don't need a pro photo editor to add some style to your images with various photo filters such as Black&White, Neon Glow, Oil Painting and many others.

☆ Photo collages:
create a wonderful picture of you and your friend floating together in a sentimental or futuristic setting.

The simple and intuitive app interface helps you quickly learn how to use the picture editor. Almost a dozen of new photo frames and effects is added with each update. We maintain a fruitful dialogue with our users. If you didn't find a particular photo effect in the library, contact the team and you might see it in the next update.

Photo Lab will change your life forever!*
__________
* Photo Lab may or may not change your life but you're totally going to love it!


Please note that Photo Lab is an Internet-based application. It helps us keep your devices' memory free from tons of resources required to create high-quality artworks of your photos.

🎉ps: Photo Lab app is officially announced one of the best apps of 2017 by Google, Russia🎉
summary: Photo filters, picture frames, effects, collages & montage for quick touch-ups

Tortola

recentChanges:
Halloween is closer than you think and we’ve prepared something unique for the spookiest night of the year!

Ladies and Gentlemen, please welcome our special “Halloween” tab. No more searches. All creepy, scary, bootiful, and frightening combos are gathered together in one place.
comments: I really enjoyed this app it's actually really cool! Now that it was Holloween I tried it... Yes it is neat. The only issue is that you can use the app just to see if you like it and it will give you a lot of options but I didn't like that if you didn't purchase this app... You get cut off and you cut off your potential customers to early I understand that you're goal is to make money off your app.Im not sure about the purchase I don't know what more it has to offer just get cut off .

When signing up for monthly pro, the app tells you your first 3 days are free and "at the end of the 3 day trial period an auto-renewable subscription will be activated automatically." This is a lie! There is no free trial; you will be charged immediately! Luckily I disputed the charges with Google and got my money back, but beware y'all, there is no free trial, regardless of what my screenshot of the app clearly says.

This is an awesome app! There are two paid option that are reasonable and so worth it. With so many cool options and features that are available to try for free you will definitely stay busy and will want to the paid version and the more you share the smarter the app gets so you can't go wrong. I Definitely recommend this app.
Luv 💗. I use this app all the time. I love it. The only thing id say it needs to improve on is the fact that there are not many options that work for group photos. Most onky work for selfies

I dropped off the one star and reduced it to zero. The devs responded about getting the 1 year option and everything was wrong. Here's what you have to do: cancel your subscription and wait for a little bit. You will then have MANY places where they nag you to go PRO and from there you can choose either subscription option. You cannot do like the dev said. This is sure a lot more trouble than it's worth. UNINSTALLED! ---ORIGINAL review: I'm giving this ONE star because of their business model. Like other's, the first thing I saw was an offer of 3 day free trial with $4.99 PER MONTH after, plus another offer (that I can no longer find) for $9.99 per year. I might go for the yearly option except for the fact that everything they do seems shady. There are NO options and that includes no way within the app to tell it not to send notifications. I immediately was targeted with a notification and after a few of those, I had to go into the phone's notification settings to block them. They constantly nag me to share my pictures on their web site so they can have free use of my creations which they make it VERY difficult to remove what you shared and changed your mind. The online website provides NO options to delete your shares. Somewhere, I saw a recommendation for this app but it didn't give a clue about how expensive it was (even on the App Store, there is little to warn you). You find this out right away when you first run it. Positive note: the app itself is very fun and very addictive. It's all internet based functions, very little is actually on the phone taking up your memory. If you have weak internet or poor signal, this will be frustrating slow. If I can't find the overpriced $9.99 per year option, I'm not continuing this grossly overpriced monthly subscription. It's fun, but not THAT fun. With the lack of information and options, I am suspect of this company's motives. There is so much wrong with this company and it's functions it's kind of scary.

title: Chime - Mobile Banking
description:
Welcome to banking made awesome. 

Chime is mobile and online banking with no hidden fees: get your paycheck up to 2 days early* with direct deposit, have fee-free overdraft when you’re in a pinch, grow your savings automatically, and manage your finances like a boss using the highly-rated Chime mobile banking app.

When you bank with Chime, you get a Visa® Debit Card, a Spending Account, and an optional Savings Account to help you save money. 

Applying for an account is free, takes less than 2 minutes and it won’t affect your credit score!

Here’s what our members love most about Chime:
• Get your paycheck up to 2 days early* with direct deposit
• Fee-free overdraft.** We’ll spot you on debit card purchases with no overdraft fees. 
• No hidden fees: no monthly fees, no overdraft fees, no foreign transaction fees, no minimum balance requirements 
• Over 38,000 fee-free ATMs with Moneypass and Visa Plus Alliance
• Real-time transaction notifications
• Daily balance alerts
• Block your card instantly in-app
• Grow your savings automatically with our Savings Account
• Send money instantly with Pay Friends to other Chime members. 
• Deposit checks using Mobile Check Deposit for eligible members.^ 
• Apple Pay™ / Google Pay™ for when you forget your wallet
• Move money between your other bank accounts
• EMV chip card security
• Friendly and responsive customer support

With the Chime mobile banking app, you can stay in control of your money. Track your spending, link your other bank accounts, and save money.

How to switch banks:
• Step 1: Open Your Account: Download the app and sign up. Once approved, we’ll send you your Chime card within two weeks!
• Step 2: Fund Your Account: Set up a direct deposit with your employer or payer to have funds deposited to your Chime account every payday. You can also connect other bank accounts and transfer funds from your existing bank account.
• Step 3: Update Bill Payments: Activate your card when it arrives, add it to Apple Pay, and set up recurring bill payments with your Chime card number or with your Chime Spending Account and routing numbers.

 For more information please visit www.chime.com.

***Learn how we collect and use your information by visiting our Privacy Policy at https://www.chimebank.com/policies/chime/privacy-policy/.***

Banking services provided by, and debit card issued by, The Bancorp Bank, or Stride Bank, N.A., Members FDIC, pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. Debit card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

*Early access to direct deposit funds depends on the timing of payer’s submission of deposits. We generally post such deposits on the day they are received which may be up to 2 days earlier than the payer’s scheduled payment date.
**Chime SpotMe is an optional, no fee service that requires that you receive $500 in direct deposit a month to qualify to overdraw your account up to $20 on debit card purchases. Chime, in its sole discretion, may allow you to withdraw your account up to $100 or more based on your Chime Account history, direct deposit history and amount, spending activity and other risk-based factors. Your Limit will be displayed to you within the Chime mobile app. You will receive notice of any changes to your Limit. Your Limit may be increased or lowered at any time by Chime.
^Not all new or existing customers are eligible to use Mobile Deposit. There are qualifications and enrollment requirements for participation in Mobile Deposit, and we reserve the right to change the qualification and enrollment requirements in our sole discretion at any time without prior notice. We may require you to upload a picture of your driver’s license or other identifying documents prior to using Mobile Deposit. Eligibility requirements can be found online after you have signed into your Spending Account.

recentChanges: Happy Halloween! If you're not out trick or treating, you can have fun reading up on our latest release notes. Instead of leaving you with some tricks, we're leaving a few treats in the form of bug fixes.
comments: amazing bank. love the instant notifications and easy direct deposits. very simple to use. Update: 10/20 Go with a real bank. This bank enjoys doing random maintenance on all accounts. Completely disabling your account for DAYS at a time. So far my account has been disabled for 2 days. There's plenty of money in my account, I just can't use any of it. Dropped to 3 stars simply because it's a free bank account. That's the only good thing about Chime. Its free. They just control your money.

My experience with Chime overall has been a great one. Instead of getting paid on Fridays, I get paid on Wednesdays every week via direct deposit. Two days early! Chime also offers the SpotMe feature, which is basically overdraft protection with no fees. Another cool feature for this being a virtual bank, is you have the option to set up a Secured Credit Builder Card with no pre-set credit limit, up to $10,000. I'm on the waitlist right now, but from what I read, it sounds very helpful!

More honest review today, today marks the third time in two months that time bank has frozen, has had technical difficulties and has no one available to up to talk to customers for hours on end. Now yes time is convenient, but there are other cards like it on the market. Which I am now starting to look into, as well as brick and mortar building type banks because unfortunately I can't let this keep happening especially not during the holiday season.

I have had this mobile banking app for over 6 years and haven't had any problems but recently their have been outages causing the app to be unavailable and my money unusable! I'm extremely furious that they can't keep their app working properly so I can use MY MONEY! Currently waiting for the app to be available so I can take my money and go to another bank! This is outrageous and you get no compensation for the late payments or overall difficulty of not being able to use YOUR MONEY!

I would be rating this higher, but for some reason I am not being shown a history of my purchases on the app. My girlfriend doesn't seem to be having this issue, only me. I have double checked to ensure that I have the most recent update, which I do. I cannot determine the cause for this. Any advice or assistance would be appreciated. The 'support bot' has not been any help at all. Thanks.

title: Kids Doodle - Color & Draw Free Game
description:
Kids Doodle, the BEST android drawing app for kids!

Kids Doodle is particularly designed for kids with super easy-to-use painting on photo or canvas. 

It has endless bright colors and 24 beautiful brushes, such as glow, neon, rainbow, crayon and sketchy, etc.

App supports unique "movie" mode, which can play back kid's artwork like a small film. Children love it so much!

The built-in gallery stores both kids drawing picture and drawing procedure. Kids can continue their drawing whenever they want, or "movie" their previous masterpiece anytime they would love.

 GAME FEATURES:
* paint on photo or canvas * 24 brushes, such as glow, neon, fireworks, spark, star, rainbow, crayon, spray, ribbon, etc 
* bright colors
* creative drawing
* built-in art gallery stores both doodle and doodle animation. 
* "movie" mode to play back the drawing like a little film. 
* undo, redo 
* share drawing via Facebook, twitter, instagram, gmail, etc.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rObLR7_Bjec

Share your Art on Kids Doodle Facebook Page
http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kids-Doodle/288132957929045

Great app if you want to do some doodling or if you have a great drawing idea you can draw it on there so you remember for when you actually do it with a proper pro art app, but trying to do professional art on that app isn't possible (or it's just really hard) it's awesome to keep kids entertained with but has its cons but for what the game is made for it's awesome

Its really fun to right your name then to plus then right your siblinings name! then do some hearts everyone the save it then go to gallery then boom it looks super cute! and as everyone else is saying i wish theres no adds and i wish u can pick your color of your brush but still have a option if you want rainbow! But everything else awesome game! Perfect if you don't have internet where ever your going! ♡

This was so good it had all the effects for doodling like glowing neon colours its been like five days since I downloaded this app and I have made like 15 drawings that are extremely beautiful i loved this app and if you love editing glowing neon colours or sparkles I would recommend you to download this app it was very fun to draw in this ✨

This is a great app, not just for kids. I enjoy making some fun doodle too. And i like it can play back the drawing process. If one can choose to share just the image or the drawing process video, it will then be 5 star app.

title: MICO: Make Friends, Live Chat and Go Live Stream
description:
What can you do in MICO Chat❓

🌟Highlights🌟

💬Chat💬 - Chat with random strangers either nearby or global directly

👫Match👫 - Match and meet friends in many creative ways

🤳Moments🤳 - Share your stories and get interacted with people nearby

🎤Live🎤 - Live house, live battle, and live chat with video or voice.

🎉Party🎉 - Up to 9 people video chat, ready to be on cloud 9

💧Purity💧 - A positive, energetic and healthy environment for you 
__________________________________________________________________________

MICO Chat is a clean and healthy social platform that will bring you to strike up a friendship and get started live streaming. There are many entertaining stories shared by popular people nearby and interactive live video streams performed by tons of talented broadcasters worldwide. 

✔️Random Stranger Chat: Meet and chat with strangers via random match✔️

-Say Hi to a stranger just one tap away, start a message, video, or voice chat, even in a group.👫
-Get a chance to pick a 100% match by swiping left or right, make new friends accurately and fast. Randomly live chat and hang out with real people nearby or worldwide. 🚀    

✔️Share moments: Enjoy the fun with friends or people nearby✔️

-By sharing photos and short videos on moments, you will catch strangers' eyes around you and will increase your chances of chatting with strangers nearby. 👀
-Interact easily with popular people around you by giving likes, comments, and sending your greeting right now to make friends.  👋  
 

✔️Live Streaming: Go live and watch live stream whenever you want✔️

-Watch the live stream and enjoy live videos. Tons of talented broadcasters from more than 100 different countries are gathered together in MICO. They offer thousands of exciting live shows every day. 😄
-One-touch to go live. Dancing, singing, talk show, online game, no matter what talent you have, MICO will be the biggest stage for you to broadcast your skills, everyone can be a star in MICO. New beautiful stickers and filters make you cuter, more beautiful, and more confident in the live video. 🎤
-Follow the broadcasters and get a chance to have an idea conversation outside the live room. You can also chat with friendly audiences by tapping on their icons. 🕺
 
✔️Group Live Chat: Voice or live video chat with more people✔️

-The more people watching, the more fantastic the video chat will be. Join a group chat room and start a voice or live video chat party with strangers, make friends, and have fun with beautiful girls and handsome guys. 🎉
-Create a multi-guest video chat room, invite more friends via video call to live chat with you or wait strangers enter your chat room, live video chat or voice chat with them, meet more interesting people.  🥳

✔️2v2 Video Live PK: New upgrade of traditional Live PK mode✔️

-2v2 Live PK is not only the live stream competition between broadcasters but also with the audience. A broadcaster can invite a friend to start a 2v2 live PK. The loser will accept the lovely punishment. Turn on your camera, chat via video stream, come and enjoy a funny live PK.  👩‍👩‍👧‍👧

✔️Real-time Translation: No barrier in stranger chat✔️

-Click the translation button to easily break the language barrier in random stranger chat.
-Match random chat with strangers around the world without any language problem in MICO. It is easy to meet or makes friends from other countries whenever and wherever you want. 💬

Meet me in MICO, one of the most popular worldwide social networking apps where you can enjoy a random chat, live streams, meet with strangers, short videos & photos sharing, video live chat!
Your questions and feedback are always welcome! Please drop us a line:
Email: contact@micous.com
Twitter: http://twitter.com/micoapp
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/micoteam
Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/micoapp
https://www.facebook.com/micoapp.english

comments: Bad experience. Don't download load it I didn't read the review and its lame that you have to put in Facebook and gmail in order to meet with people then the other problem is that if you haven't log in your phone number and want to unlink the websites you have to add the number in order to unlink it. DO NOT INSTALL. if you don't believe me and other people experience it yourself.

Sooo many fake accounts(robots)(Bots)(AI)(Artificial Intelligence). Too many people using the same exact message. Nobody says anything real. For what it's worth the app feels nice and the programmer should be proud of their own craftsmanship.
Its a good app just needs to improve more and they should think of some advantages for the senders as the senders invest huge amounts in the app

Do not download. The layout is confusing, invasive, and refuses to respond through their customer service email when they have no option to permanently delete unless you want to link Facebook, google, and your phone number. I didn't read the reviews and tried on a whim. Seriously, don't install it. If there were such a thing as negative stars or turds, this app deserve the lot of those. Has anyone successfully deleted their account from there?

Tiktok is BY FAR better. I spent 4 hours trying to figure out this app, and customer service did NOT help. The app DOES have potential, but the problem right now is, there needs to be an entire rescripting of the English version of this app. User guidelines are vague and not well written. FAQ does not hold enough information. The 24-7 customer service bot is all AI and there is no actual person, unless they give you an email.. which I am still waiting for.. App is fun, but still needs work.

title: Battle Legion - Mass Battler
description:
Massive 100v100 Unit Battles - Build an army and watch it fight idle-style - Plenty of units and skins. Endless fun! Battle Legion puts you in shoes of an aspiring commander, and as you rank up through unforgettable victories, so does your legion.

Design and tweak your army from dozens of unique units, ranging from classic sword and shield fighters to arcane wizardry, dark age machinery, and mythical creatures. Equip your troops with Powers that match your masterplan, sit back, and watch how they fight pitted enemy legions to the bitter end.

- BITESIZED COMBAT: Battles last 20 seconds or less.
- LAID BACK GAMING: You plan the army layout, and they do the fighting.
- AUTO-PLAY: Your legion keeps fighting as you go about your daily business.
- COSMETICS: Choose what your units, battlefield, and banner looks like.
- PLAYER BATTLES: Face other players in the battlefield and learn from their strategies.
- POWER UP: Boost your units with dynamic seasonal Powers.
- REFRESHING SEASONS: New content introduced in bi-weekly Seasons, with fourth Season marking the dawn of a new Era.

Battle Legion has an active Discord community of over 10K members where players discuss winning strategies, tips and development of the game — with devs frequently participating in the chat. Weekly streams and community events hosted on Youtube!

descriptionHTML:
Massive 100v100 Unit Battles - Build an army and watch it fight idle-style - Plenty of units and skins. Endless fun! Battle Legion puts you in shoes of an aspiring commander, and as you rank up through unforgettable victories, so does your legion.

Design and tweak your army from dozens of unique units, ranging from classic sword and shield fighters to arcane wizardry, dark age machinery, and mythical creatures. Equip your troops with Powers that match your masterplan, sit back, and watch how they fight pitted enemy legions to the bitter end.

- BITESIZED COMBAT: Battles last 20 seconds or less.
- LAID BACK GAMING: You plan the army layout, and they do the fighting.
- AUTO-PLAY: Your legion keeps fighting as you go about your daily business.
- COSMETICS: Choose what your units, battlefield, and banner looks like.
- PLAYER BATTLES: Face other players in the battlefield and learn from their strategies.
- POWER UP: Boost your units with dynamic seasonal Powers.
- REFRESHING SEASONS: New content introduced in bi-weekly Seasons, with fourth Season marking the dawn of a new Era.

Battle Legion has an active Discord community of over 10K members where players discuss winning strategies, tips and development of the game — with devs frequently participating in the chat. Weekly streams and community events hosted on Youtube!

Travel across the realm and hunt down rogue units on the loose!
Event menu now supports multiple simultaneous events
Season 3 of Fury of the Elements has begun!
New Premium Cosmetics & Seasonal Powerstones
Army edit functionality now more accessible
See in-game News for full list of changes

comments: The entire game is a "pay to win" nightmare... It is designed to artificially limit your progress in as many ways as you can think of. You cant upgrade your units without "shards" which are completely random. Worse, there is also an insultingly low "daily gold limit." Gold is also required to make any upgrades. Worse, if you try to fight without leveling up, you will actually LOSE all of your hard earned progress. THE ONLY WAY TO WIN THIS GAME, IS TO NEVER PLAY IT IN THE FIRST PLACE!

Normally I don't like these types of games (auto battlers), but this is actually the first one that I've enjoyed. The game has quite a bit of strategy to it and oozes quality. The monetization system is questionable of course, it's pay-to-win and that is why I will not spend any money on it (I would happily have had the game as a premium title instead) and the game will get old quite fast for me because of that. But for now it is quite fun.

Its a expensive game and you will not win if you never pay that why i notice. The winning rate will totally drop and you will done nothing once you stop spending. Gain no experience as well when loosing in the season pass. They will give just a star for wagon which will take 4 to 8 hours. You will enjoy playing at first but will loose interest in the long run

Great game, I've been playing for a couple of months now without spending a cent. Quite playable without paying, although progess is slow after reaching certain level. Good variety of units but simple enough to relax and enjoy. Also you choose if you want to watch adds for resources. My only complaint is that, lacking resources, it is difficult to upgrade units, and therefore change strategies, once you are at a certian level. But overall a great game!

Update fail. Game now crashes immediately after the 1st splash screen. Anyway it's just a cash grab. The now rampamt "battle pass" last barely a week & doesnt grant enogu to be worth buying even if it lasted a month or more like most others do. No real strategy, just whoever buys the most, wins & no real game as combat is entirely automated.

title: PECS - Speech Therapy for Toddlers
description:
PECS (Picture Exchange Communication System) is for speech therapy, it is unique AAC (alternative/augmentative communication system) developed in the USA developed for use with children with speech impediments. It is classified within the principle called speech and skills development and has been used with hundreds of autistic children in the United States and many other countries.

It is a system that does not require complex materials or high teaching methods, and does not contain expensive tools, comprehensive tests, or even costly staff or high parenting training, and is used in various different environments, including home, class and society.

This system was applied with children at the age of 18 months, and over time it was applied with adults, due to the difficulties faced by speech therapists in implementing training programs to communicate with autistic children to develop speech and communication skills in many Over the years, workers took months to try to develop the skill of kinetic / vocal imitation.

Children with autism spectrum disorder are not strongly influenced by social reinforcement, so it had to start communicative exercises with functional actions that engage the child to interact with reward reinforcements.

Speech therapists have tried to teach and train silent children to speak, and this type of training usually begins with trying to teach the child to look at the trainer's face or eyes, and then reward the child for producing many sounds, then the stage of imitating sounds and another studying the child to mix these sounds into words The coach chooses it.

According to this type of education, it will take many weeks to solve the problem of delayed speech in children if it is not many months, and during this long time, the child does not have a useful way to communicate with others to express his basic needs. 

During this long period the children did not have appropriate or reasonable means to express their basic needs, and thus they expressed their needs in a variety of poorly adapted ways, and this exacerbated the children's speech delay, then the trainers in this sign language program stopped themselves as they encountered difficulty with children who did not imitate efficiently And when they tried to apply the picture teaching system, they found that children had excessive hand movements, which they imagined the process of reading the communicative message, and also children did not initiate exchange of communication.

Some language training programs include Alternative programs for communication, such as sign language, for example, but PECS is a system that includes skills that are a prerequisite for teaching this system similar to those related to speech training.

Benefits:

• Speech therapy using PECS technique.
• Making the autistic child easily communicate with the outside world using easy AAC app.
• Improving communication and developing communication skills.
• Treatment of delayed speech in children.
• Useful in pronunciation, articulation, and speech improvement in children.
• It can be used for deaf and dumb people.
• Excellent in speaking sessions for children.
• Increase and raise the degree of communication in children.
• Reducing speech impediments

Advantages:

• Providing more than 1,300 talking cards.
• Ease of use with simple interface.
• Ability to add or modify an existing card.
• Control the text of the card.
• multilingual to help more children.
• Control the way cards are displayed according to the required level.
• Full support for the Arabic language, as it was not available previously.

Speech therapists recommend that parents should use PECS - Speech Therapy for Toddlers app in children's speech sessions, especially teaching speech for late children using PECS, and the application also helps a lot in the process of communication.

title: Norton Mobile Security - Antivirus & Anti-Malware
description:
Norton Mobile Security & Antivirus is an award winning mobile [4] phone security service and virus protection app. This virus detector and remover for androids helps protect your devices against malware, viruses and threats such as malicious apps, theft, and websites designed to steal your information and money. Norton has years of experience in providing anti virus protection for your PC and now it is a trusted name in mobile phone security apps.

Android Security Features (including 30-Day Trial [1])

---------------------------------------------

Did you know that 75% of mobile apps fail basic security tests?
(Gartner report, 2014)

★ App Advisor powered by Norton™ Mobile Insight, automatically checks apps for potential privacy risks, high battery and data usage or intrusive behavior before download. [3]

★ Android Antivirus: A malware scanner that helps to remove apps that have malware, spyware, or an Android virus that can harm or slow your device. Proactive virus detector, virus cleaner and antivirus protection.[3]

★ WiFi Security helps your device stay safe when connecting to public Wi-Fi. Wi-Fi Security alerts if an unknown party on the same Wi-Fi network is spying on your online activity, known as a man-in-the-middle (MITM) attacks.

★ Surveillance App Protection helps protect your online privacy and security by letting you know if an app is sharing your device’s location, contacts, photos, and messages without your authorization.

★ Web Protection offers comprehensive phone security while surfing online to help protect you against visiting malicious and phishing sites.

★ Safe Search: In-app search engine connects to NortonLifeLock’s global threat database to flag unsafe sites right in your search results.

★ Call Blocking allows you to automatically block calls from specific phone numbers or anonymous or unknown numbers (smartphones only).

★ Android System Advisor: Helps scan your device and Android OS to identify points of attack that can leave you exposed to cyber threats

★ Privacy Report Interactive Map shows where in the world apps send personal information and photos



---------------------------------------------

Another trusted app from Norton. Norton Security & Antivirus provides proactive anti-malware, spyware and antivirus protection. This virus detector and remover will ensure that your phone security is as tight as it can be.


[1] SUBSCRIPTION DETAILS:

Cancel from this page or within your Google Play account before the end of the trial to avoid payment
After 30-day trial, your subscription will start and renew automatically annually unless canceled
Annual subscription is for one device only
Money-back guarantee: with annual subscription. For refund information, visit support.norton.com
Annual subscription is for one device only

NortonLifelock respects your privacy and promises to safeguard your personal data. For more information: http://www.norton.com/mobile-privacy-policy

comments: Look. It works and is effective. However. For the sake of going in educated, know that if you don't know how to unsubscribe via Google Play, Norton is going to make finding out a bad time. They deliberately force you to make an account, force you to share details to contact support, and deliberately provide no information on how to unsubscribe from the service. That type of behavior says a LOT about the ethics of a company. Be aware before making a commitment.

I mainly got this Norton app for the excellent call blocking features... everything else was just a plus. Now, a message on the app indicates the call blocking feature will be discontinued in a future update so that Norton can add some "exciting new features." Nothing could be exciting enough without being able to block calls! I'll finish out the year I paid for and then move to something else....for free!

I have never had the real time fraud and spam call alerts since I've installed the Norton 360 app, I wish it would block telemarketers and robocalls, not only in the calling but also in the messaging. I'm forever getting calls from what I know I've reported to the blocking app, which I have to manually put in the blocking app. I love the safe search feature, I love the play store features that works you of an unsafe app before you download it. I love so far the identity safe features also.

Perfect Mix of Mobile Security & Antivirus Combo For Galaxy Note 4 Running On Android 6.0.1 Everything seems to run well with no issues. I think I'll stick with this current updated version 4.8.0 on my phone since updating to much further might start to have a negative effects on my old operating system. Keep up the good work.👈

LOUSY! VPN constantly has to be logged into over & over ... AND the app doesn't recognize login info so you are returned to the login screen. The antivirus can be running at the same time but the VPN is a separate app. Very poor design. Added 10/29/20 - just rec'd notice Norton is removing Call Block feature. RUFKM?? That's one of the MOST important features!! Time to find a BETTER security app. Sorry Norton. Your app is not worth the cost anymore.

title: Estação Brincar
description:
Estação Brincar é um jogo em Realidade Aumentada (RA) baseado no método TEACCH para servir de complemento na aprendizagem de crianças com transtorno do espectro autista.
Apresenta um total de 5 atividades com o foco no Descobrimento, Avaliação, Memorização, Retenção e Criação

Esta aplicação faz parte de um projeto de pesquisa chamado:  "Estação Brincar: Um Jogo Com Realidade Aumentada no Auxílio ao Desenvolvimento Cognitivo de Crianças com Transtorno do Espectro Autista".

O valor simbólico a ser pago é apenas para apoiar o desenvolvimento de jogos brasileiros e um incentivo para que possamos continuar a nossa pesquisa.

Download dos Cards pode ser feito dentro do próprio aplicativo na tela de configurações

title: Love Autism: News, Stories, Guide, Video Lessons
description:
Are you in search of an autism guide and autism resources? A place where you can also get autism video and autism news. Simply an autism and autism stories app that can be of great help for individuals with Autism. Well, Love Autism is the perfect match for you.

❤️WHY LOVE AUTISM?
Most of us are able to integrate all of the sensory information that we constantly face, paying attention to and tolerating important sensory information and disregarding information that is less important at that moment. For individuals with AUTISM, however, this is not the case. Many people with autism have difficulties processing information taken in through senses. Our goal is to help spread the word about Autism Awareness through our brand.

❤️GREAT SOURCE OF USEFUL INFORMATION
Love Autism - Loving The Autism Community and Helping in any way possible. We will keep you up to date with the latest news on Autism, as well as provide pointers and guide you on your Autism journey. We have included several Social Stories, our E-Book, video lessons and much more. 

The best thing is that our autism stories and autism news are frequently updated giving you reliable info and autism resources constantly.

title: TDAH
description:
La app TDAH - Trastorno por Déficit de Atención e Hiperactividad es una aplicación gratuita en español para colaborar con aquellas personas involucradas con personas con este trastorno o que deseen conocer más al respecto.

La aplicación incluye:
■ Noticias (RSS) relacionadas con el TDAH.
■ Test EDAH.
■ Autoevaluación TDAH para adultos.
■ Test de caras.
■ Algunas películas recomendadas con contenido relacionado al TDAH.
■ Descargas de libros PDF relacionados con el TDAH.
■ Enlaces relacionados.

Los resultados del test no son almacenados en ninguna forma por la aplicación. la respuesta se indica al enviar el test para su visionado y no es accesible de nuevo.

Los resultados de los test son meramente informativos y ni son concluyentes ni constituyen un diagnostico. En caso de cualquier duda acuda a su médico.

App desarrollada por Proyecto-Tic.es - Ribadesella - Llanes - Asturias - España

title: Houseparty
description:
Houseparty is the face-to-face social network where you can connect with the people you care about most. The app makes connecting face to face effortless, alerting you when your friends are “in the house” and ready to chat so you can jump right into the conversation. The same goes for you opening the app! Your friends will know you’re in the app and ready to chat, so they can join you (…because rejected calls are so last year). Houseparty is truly the next best thing to hanging out in person. See your friends more often on Houseparty.

Questions? Comments? Just want a friendly hello?
hello@houseparty.com
Twitter/Instagram: @houseparty

comments: Very fun video experience! This video calling app is very simple and easy to use which is what I love most about it. It works very well and I really like how friend systems, calling, and a lot of other things work. Definitely recommend if you want to start a video chat with some friends.

The app is awesome, have a lot of connection issues though if you could look into fixing them. If you could implement those it would be greatly appreciated, thank you and have a nice day.

This app is the best but isn't perfect, I played some games with my friends and got bored soon. So add some more games and questions to the trivia. Add some hindi songs too. I had experienced some network issue even after having 50 mbps wifi connection. So please do look in to it to make the app better. Houseparty will always have our support 👍🏻

Houseparty is awesome expecially during quarantine. It lets me play games with my friends online instead of in person which is impossible 😔. In the new update they added uno so we no longer have to go to another app to play which is nice. I also like the karaoke and other games.
I Recommend it to all of you because you're can call your friends and text them it's so cool. This is one of the questions in the how I rate this is this app difficult to use a little. but not much.

title: LizzyB Autism Learning Tools
description:
LizzyB Learning Tools is a totally free educational and developmental game/tool for all children. It is designed specifically for children on the autism spectrum but is also useful for neurotypical toddlers.  Children can work on matching, short-term memory, number and letter recognition, fine motor skills and more and have fun while doing it!

This app especially targets skill development for children with autism and developmental delays. Using easy to understand instructions and eye-catching animation children move through tasks commonly practiced in therapy sessions. 

Reports are provided for the parent to monitor progress and maintain records. Want to show developmental activities as part of your homeschool records? No problem! LizzyB Learning Tools records the amount of time spent in each activity and you can export it for your records. 

This is a great tool for young children and children with special needs to be able to use independently (or with minimal assistance).

Levels

Drag & Drop: Start by moving characters into the shape they fit into. As you develop your skills they’ll progress to fruits and vegetables, and eventually letters and numbers with fun characters mixed in! Words are printed alongside the matching shapes to aid in word recognition.


Maze: Move our fun characters through mazes that get bigger and more complex as you progress. Develop your hand eye and fine motor coordination as you play.


Memory: Match numbers, shapes, fun characters, and more! The levels become more challenging as you go! Both memory and visual skills can be strengthened in these levels.


Balloons: Follow the instructions and choose only the balloon indicated. We get to practice colors, numbers, and letters while balloons and birds fly in an engaging and exciting popping adventure! This is a great way to practice attention and instruction following in a colorful manor that’s full of movement! Watch out! The birds may pop the balloons if you don’t get to them first!


Tracing Numbers: Learn your numbers! Trace (with stroke guidance) your numbers, count the animals, and watch them leap into our fun train! This is the foundation of the number and math skills we will strengthen with more fun to come!


Tracing Letters: Now it’s time to work on your letters! Just like before, you get to trace! Trace uppercase and lowercase letters and touch the pictures that start with the level and watch them fly over to the train cars. Want to increase the difficulty? Use a stylus and work on your pencil grip!

More Levels

The base app contains space for ten-district learning 'games' with 10 levels each. 

The first five have been created and the remaining five are still under development.

Check back soon to see what Lizzy's family has cooked up.

Want to get involved? Report bugs, make suggestions, become a tester?  Stay tuned. We are working things out at this stage.

title: Fire Emblem Heroes
description:
Nintendo's hit strategy-RPG Fire Emblem series, which has been going strong for more than 25 years, continues its journey on smart devices.

Fight battles customized for touch screens and on-the-go play. Summon characters from across the Fire Emblem universe. Develop your Heroes' skills, and take them to new heights. This is your adventure—a Fire Emblem that's like nothing you've seen before!

This application is free to download and offers some optional in-app purchases.

■ An epic quest

The game features an ongoing, original story where new characters and dozens upon dozens of battle-tested Heroes from across the Fire Emblem universe meet.

There are over 1,100 story stages available as of June 2020! (This total includes all difficulty modes.) Clear these story stages and you'll earn Orbs, which are used for summoning Heroes.
New story chapters are added frequently, so don't miss out!

■ Intense battles

Take part in strategic turn-based battles streamlined for on-the-go play with maps that fit in the palm of your hand! You'll need to think hard about the advantages and disadvantages of each Hero's weapon...and even evaluate the map itself as you battle. Lead your army with easy touch-and-drag controls, including the ability to attack by simply swiping an ally over an enemy.

New to strategic turn-based battles? Don't worry! Use the Auto-Battle option to have your characters fight on their own.

■ Strengthen your favorite Heroes

There are many ways to strengthen your allies: leveling, skills, weapons, equipable items, and more. Take your characters to greater and greater heights as you battle for victory.

■ Replayable modes

In addition to the main story, there are many other modes where you can strengthen your allies, compete against other players, and more. 

■ Original characters meet legendary Heroes

The game features numerous Hero characters from the Fire Emblem series and brand-new characters created by artists Yusuke Kozaki, Shigeki Maeshima, and Yoshiku. Some Heroes will fight at your side as allies, while others may stand in your way as fierce enemies to be defeated and added to your army.

Featuring Heroes from the following games in the series!

・ Fire Emblem: Shadow Dragon & the Blade of Light
・ Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem
・ Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War
・ Fire Emblem: Thracia 776
・ Fire Emblem: The Binding Blade
・ Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade
・ Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones
・ Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance
・ Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn
・ Fire Emblem: New Mystery of the Emblem
・ Fire Emblem Awakening
・ Fire Emblem Fates: Birthright/Conquest
・ Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia
・ Fire Emblem: Three Houses
・ Tokyo Mirage Sessions ♯FE Encore

* Internet connectivity required to play. Data charges may apply.
* You must be at least 13+ to use this game with a Nintendo Account.
* We permit our third-party partners to collect data from this app for analytical and marketing purposes. For more information about our ads, please see the “How we use your information” section of the Nintendo Privacy Policy.
* Variations in individual device specifications and other applications being run on a device may affect normal operation of this application.
* May include advertising.

contentRatingDescription: Fantasy Violence, Suggestive Themes, Partial Nudity
recentChanges: Issues have been addressed.
comments: A good strategy game, not too mechanically complex and decently challenging. A treat for fans of the series. Most of the negative reviews are people upset about being able to buy things. Look, all free games want your money. But FEH is pretty generous with what you get for free, has no ads, is from a trusted name, and no game mode is behind a pay wall. You can build up a deep bench of heroes and be competitive in PVP modes and never spend a single dollar.

FEH is unfortunately plagued by many issues. If you're like me, and play for the characters you love, you won't have fun. I've spent hundreds of hours (and real money) collecting and upgrading my favorites, just for them to be outclassed by whatever new OP 5* of the week gets released. You have to pull a character 11 times to max out their power, ridiculous. It's all up to luck if you get the characters you want, and even if you do they'll probably suck. Play Three Houses instead.

I love this game, and there is a ton of stuff to do in it. The amount of free orbs (the real money currency) you get seems to be decent. While I have some minor balancing issues with the game, the main reason I am giving it 4 stars is because of the limit on inventory. There are 580 characters; why do we only get 300 slots before having to spend orbs? This has not changed since the launch of the game as far as I'm aware. I feel like we should have free slots equal to the # of different units

As someone who spent 2 thousand on this game, i feel qualified to say: I cant believe advanced wars died to this franchise. Power creep. Bloated summoning pool. Terrible features. Predatory mechanics to spend money. If you like this stuff, then this is the game for you. Dont speak to me ever again, intelligent systems. Hit me with a generic automated response and ill hit ya with a KleanYoSelf

Very fun and rewarding. Purchases are not needed for good characters but I do it anyway because the prices are actually reasonable. Edit: I was actually getting a new player new character summon boost I wasn't aware of back then. It is a little hard to get the characters you want without spending money, and sometimes even still so with spending, but if you are a Fire Emblem fan, it is still a very fun, challenging, and rewarding game.

title: Love Choice: Interactive game, new stories&episode
description:
Love Choice is a great collection of story games!
It is an episode of the story of each of us. We are inspired by this feeling to make choices, to accept decisions, and to be romantic. Love awakens dreams and imagination. It drives our passion to write more great chapters, and capture all the moments of love journeys.

And remember: Moments of love is the greatest moments of your journey!
 
 💜💜💜

So what will you do for love?
- choose your interactive stories;
- Change fate through your choices;
- make your storyline full of drama, romance and dreams;
- Develop relationships with your favourite characters;
- Customize your avatar and design outfit;
- seek the best way to make good choices;
- Immerse yourself in thousands of diverse worlds!
- remember, every decision and every choice matters;
- Discover all of the different endings of each episode;
- so keep romance and find a true love


📚📖Here are some of top stories: 📖📚

😈🍓👠Demons in High Heels
Lily works at "Helluv", the fashion industry giant in New York. The closer look at the job of the dreams reveals that the company is actually is a battleground for supernatural powers. And those powers are really interested in Lily.

 🏃‍♀️🌹💃Runway Runaway
Caroline's boyfriend has cheated on her, but her life couldn't get better. The ex offers her to design a runway show in Pairs. Her boyfriend is feeling remorseful and misses her. Charming and suave gentlemen are all around her. Caroline takes up on the offer, takes her best friend and goes to conquer the City of Love.

🌆💄🎬Stardom is Priceless.
If you can't conquer Hollywood and become an actress, there's always a plan "B". A simple midwest lass Mary decides to work as an agent, so she could get meet the celebrities, get her hands on the juiciest productions and get to know the glamourous movie industry.

🎊👗🧹Made Maid
In this episode Jennifer lost everything almost overnight and found herself in her personal "hell". Now, the only way to break free of this life is the invitation from a handsome and rich young man with a very picky family...

🌶💍🕵️‍♀️My Roommate is a Spy
Lucy looks for a new roommate, the rent could help her make ends meet. The best candidate is a handsome and serious young man. But he has a terrible secret. And before it is even revealed, Lucy finds herself being hunted down by international spies.

🧛‍♀️🔮⛓VAMP U
Lisa is studying mythology, history and urban legends at her university. The subject of research becomes dangerously real when she realizes that she's surrounded by hungry vampires, and the only way to fight them is somewhere in her late father's journal...

👑⚔️🍷Love and Duty
Medieval French is very unpredictable. Today Juliette helps her dad with chores in his tavern. The next day, she's abducted by a count's son and imprisoned in his family castle. A knight sympathises her, but he's too loyal to his master to betray him, and people at court don't appreciate Juliette's company...

Plus lot of other books.
More chapters and episodes are coming soon.

💜💜💜
As one of the oldest game companies, we decided to bring our experience in storytelling genre. Love Choice writers worked with famous directors in Hollywood, had worked on top-rated tv shows and movies. 

 Written with passion, the choices game is simulation game is for everyone, just like dating sim or great storyline romance movie, but you can choose your style, pick every dress you want and act the exact way you want to act: be billionaire, bad girl vampire, or seduce an arrogant prince. Your choices can change the whole storyline! 
Try romance, adventure, thriller, drama, horror and more… Love Choice is one of the interactive story games that gives you the opportunity to simulate your own story, just like in date sims! You can get everything you desire in relationship, the very destiny is in your hands.

comments: DON'T PLAY, DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME! It would be a nice game but unless your willing to spend money your not going to get anywhere. Its ridiculously difficult to get any 💎's to move along in the game. I couldn't even get past creating my character because I didn't have enough 💎's. And watching a bunch of ads to try and get gems no thanks.

The app is good for casual play, I usually have a couple of books going at the one time to build up diamonds. The only criticism is things cost too much diamonds and sometimes the videos for free keys and diamonds don't work.

For how expensive this game is, you would think that they would update their stories. It has been two months since some of the stories received a new chapter. Choices are normally 20+ gems EACH and you're not even given that many through the free options they keep mentioning. It will take days to reach that amount using the free gem options. PLEASE don't waste your money on this game. You'll be doing yourself an enormous favor and saving yourself a load of disappointment, frustration and regret.

Fun game, but it's completely ridiculous just how expensive it is. You need a TON of diamonds to play, and there is no way of collecting nearly enough for free. You need to buy and even with that, they go so quickly it's not worth it. It's not a choice game when there are 2 options and the one you want costs you at least 20 diamonds, almost every single time. Clothing changes also cost 20 to 25 diamonds. I would be willing to pay a reasonable monthly unlimited amount to play, but this is insane.
Awesome game....just not enough free options. The game is initiated with you're having to purchase.

title: Android System WebView
description: Android WebView is a system component powered by Chrome that allows Android apps to display web content. This component is pre-installed on your device and should be kept up to date to ensure you have the latest security updates and other bug fixes.
descriptionHTML: Android WebView is a system component powered by Chrome that allows Android apps to display web content. This component is pre-installed on your device and should be kept up to date to ensure you have the latest security updates and other bug fixes.
summary: Web content for apps, powered by Chrome
recentChanges: • Bug fixes and speedy performance improvements
comments: After reading a few of the reviews, I was nervous about trying to update. Happy to say I had absolutely NO problem. I used to have problems with many updates until I realized that my VPN was working too well, lol. (Even with "safe" sites. Nord can suck and I'm sorry I paid for 3 years in advance to get a good deal, or I'd have dumped it ages ago!) I never know what update is going to be stopped until it is, so if you're having trouble and have a VPN, try pausing it then try again.

I'm always a little hesitant about updating this update after reading the reviews each time. It seems this update always seems to be tied to an update with Chrome. I have not had any issues with updating to this latest version. It is concerning, when there seems to be no feedback from the development team, who put out these updates. I hope someone is making them aware, of all the difficulties people are running into. Someone on their end should always monitor, after an update is available.
